name: Come Here, Howard!
description:
Just a normal walk through the usual park at dusk when all of a sudden the zombie apocalypse breaks out.  While the whole world is freaking out and is trying to fight off the zombies your little buddy doesn't seem to care at all! After all it is his favourite park!

Out of excitement for  play time with his favorite human on the planet Howard starts to jump and run around while completely ignoring the zombies. Howard begins to get OUT OF CONTROL! 

So you do what every good dog owner would do ... protect yout good boy at all cost!

"Come Here, Howard!" is a Twin-Stick Survival Shooter made during the 2020 GMTK Game Jam with the theme "Out of Control."

Gameplay:

-Start with a stick and earn your way up to buy better weapons
-Includes melee and range weapons
-Difficulty keeps increasing

Controls:

-Move with WASD
-Aim and Attack with the Mouse

What is missing?
- No Save/Load System

Game Design, Art, Music and Programming are made by myself, Batuhan Aran aka. Ecosphere Games.
